document.confidentialityNotice: This facsimile transmission (and/or the documents accompanying it) may contain confidential information belonging to the sender. The information is intended only for the use of the recipient. Any disclosure, copying, distribution, or the taking of any action in reliance on the contents of this information is strictly prohibited by law.
